headline: GTA Online
subtitle: 2X GTA$ and RP on Vehicle Vendetta
content:
Do you feel your adrenaline spike whenever some Sunday driver cuts you off on the Los Santos Freeway? Now you can let some of that residual tension out by blowing up the opposing team in Vehicle Vendetta, either using the twin machine guns mounted to the front of your car or assorted power-ups, like bombs or rockets, to wreak havoc.

Whatever weaponry you choose you’ll roll away with Double Rewards, all week long — win or lose.
